MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L7 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Brae Street, Holt Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:18AM. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 5:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:17PM on 21st October 2020.
